title: RIP JUNGLE
body: Has to be the worst jg update yet, turned the funnest role in the game into some fail minigame with little orbs n 20 new items that make no sense and have useless sustain but w/e recalling after every camp is fun as ty riot. never posted on forums before and ive been playing a while this update has brought me to this, wont be playing for much longer at this rate. ty riot. R.I.P JG

replies.body:
As a jungle main I love the changes!
We are finally going to see diversity in the jungle. I already started making strategies and calculations on builds over a week ago.


If you're recalling after every camp you're doing it wrong mate.
gotta give new things time son
umm nty? my client says LoL but when i get ingame all i see is WoW
new things like this when developers get carried away and basically change their games, this is how games die dont act like this isnt how it happens, rip rs
